app.title: PowerDirector - Video Editor
app.description:
PowerDirector is the ultimate AI video editor that lets you create stunning, high-quality videos quickly and easily. This comprehensive AI video maker offers a vast array of animation filters and AI Auto Edit tools, allowing you to transform your videos and photos into viral TikTok clips or engaging social media content instantly.

ü§ñ AI Editing Features
‚ñ† AI Auto Edit: Auto detects the best moments in your clips and turns them into polished videos with templates.
‚ñ† AI Image-to-Video: Templates for AI Dance, AI Kissing, and more!
‚ñ† AI Portrait: Filters for Ghibli, Disney style, and more!
‚ñ† AI Anime Video
‚ñ† AI Auto Caption
‚ñ† AI Video Enhancer
‚ñ† AI Voice Changer
‚ñ† AI Smart Cutout
‚ñ† AI Speech-to-Text
‚ñ† AI Speech Enhancement
‚ñ† AI Super Slow Motion
‚ñ† AI Background Removal
‚ñ† Body Effect with Body Tracking

--------------------------------------------------------------------

ü™Ñ Easy Editing Tools for All Experience Levels
‚ñ† Trim, cut, splice and rotate
‚ñ† Choose from thousands of free templates, effects, and filters
‚ñ† Add music to photos or videos
‚ñ† Insert text or animated titles
‚ñ† Videos and photos collages
‚ñ† Adjust speed for fast or slow motion
‚ñ† Background Removal
‚ñ† Transitions and Effects

--------------------------------------------------------------------

üé¨ Professional Video Editor for Content Creators
‚ñ† Fine-tune brightness, color, and saturation
‚ñ† Green Screen editing
‚ñ† Video stabilizer
‚ñ† Record and add voiceovers
‚ñ† Video overlay: Create spectacular double exposure effects
‚ñ† Keyframe controls: Adjust the transparency, rotation, position and scale for picture in picture and masks
‚ñ† Built-in stock library and customizable templates: add photos, music, sound effects, video intros, and outros

*Supported devices only.

üëë PREMIUM Benefits
‚ñ† Exclusive premium content (filters, motion titles, transitions, effects and more‚Ä¶)
‚ñ† Stock media content, also available for commercial use (1.5k+music, photos, stickers, stock video footage, sounds)
‚ñ† Ad free and distraction free
‚ñ† Enjoy unlimited access to our massive, royalty-free stock library powered by Getty Images

Find inspiration on Instagram: @powerdirector_app
Have a problem? Talk to us: support.cyberlink.com

Hope you enjoy editing on one of the best video editors in the world!

app.summary: Movie maker & video editing app with AI effects and green screen

reviews.text: I've been using PowerDirector for 8 years, 3 on premium. It hasn't been fun. It doesn't matter how fancy the tools or the AI gets; as it fails in doing even the simplest of tasks. When doing nearly anything with audio or video, it has a tendency to be off sync. This would be fine if it were consistent, but it's not. Audio cues are inconsistent through app reboots and where the playhead is. "Professional Video Editing Software" apparently gets trounced by Windows Movie Maker.
reviews.replyText: The audio delay can usually be related to an overloaded system. May try to update the app and OS, clear the cache, turn off all apps, and reboot the device. Or use lower-resolution and bitrate videos, fewer overlays, and effects. Reducing the project duration usually helps. For more support, please hit "Send Feedback" in the settings menuüëç

reviews.text: I absolutely love this app. It offers literally everything you would need to start your content creating journey. Has well over +100 functions, MANY of these options are available without Pro. This app also offers the ability to try out pro options and also has the option to watch an ad to let you use certain pro functions. If your a content creator, new or long time, you NEED this app. This is among one of the absolute best video editing apps.
reviews.replyText: Hi, KhristianüëçIt's happy to know PowerDirector serves you well! üåü And we will keep improving the app for you! If you'd like to learn more about video editing, please follow us on YouTube [PowerDirector Video Editor - CyberLink] and Instagram [powerdirector_app] to find more interesting tips and news out there, thank you üôÇ

reviews.text: I loved this app! I made over 80 videos in a span of less than 2 months. Everything was going great until around April 10th when Power Director updated their software. Ever since then, I have not been able to access this app on my Chromebook. The application starts to "Optimize" and the bars continue to load and then...nothing. It opens into nothing. What happened? I have tried to contact customer service and have heard nothing. I have noticed that other people have made the same complaint.

You have impressed me of late of the key framing u added to the main track and the increase in the number of tracks u have provided the app. Kudos. I then realized that it if there is anything I could also do is the ability to manipulate shapes. If you could add proper freeform to the assets we use on the app, I think no other video editing apps will be able to match it.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for your support and the suggestion about adding shape tools. We understand your scenario and limitations. Rest assured we will share the idea with our product manager and see what we can do for you. For more concerns or idea sharing, please use the "Send Feedback" in the settings menu.ü§ù

reviews.text: The fact that I can do almost computer level editing from my phone is amazing. Sure there's probably much more in depth programs out there. But for this yearly price? It's seemless and easy to use. Once you start to learn all the cool little features. The app really starts to highlight your abilities to create either simple and quick. Or long and drawn out edits. I use it to make ATV music videos from rides with friends. Pair it with the 22 galaxy Ultra S pen. And this is the perfect app. Love ‚ù§
reviews.replyText: Hi, Stephen, thanks for writing inüëçIt's happy to know you like PowerDirector! üåü And we will keep improving the app for you! If you'd like to learn more about video editing, please follow us on YouTube [PowerDirector Video Editor - CyberLink] and Instagram [powerdirector_app] to find more interesting tips and news out there, thank you üôÇ

reviews.text: This has been THE BEST APP TO MAKE MY VIDEOS HANDS DOWN!! Not only is the subscription price absolutely perfect but the things that you can do without one too is just amazing! I can't always do the subscription myself but still want to finish my projects and this app allows you too still work on and finish what you started! Also...the music selections are astounding!! Are the artists contactable by email or anything...I would just like to give them their props and say ty! get the app...20 stars!
reviews.replyText: Hi Editor, thanks for the replyüëçIt's happy to know PowerDirector does serve you well! üåü And we will keep improving the app for you! If you'd like to learn more about video editing, please follow us on YouTube [PowerDirector Video Editor - CyberLink] and Instagram [powerdirector_app] to find more interesting tips and news out there, thank you üôÇ

reviews.text: Love the app! However, I started my paid yearly subscription in August 2020 and for some reason, I don't have full access to all the premium features and there's the watermark down in the right corner. A month has Already passed since using it, I just checked and Google play store says my subscription isn't due until August 2021. Can someone please fix this issue and I should receive free month.

I like the app, but features keep getting moved around so at times I don't know where certain ones I use are. ** NOTE ** It would be nice if there was a way to earn more free credits to use AI features. No one wants to pay each time they want to use these features. Feel like you almost force a person to subscribe. let me earn more credits some how. Other than that, it's my go to movie edit app. I go to another app for free AI features since theirs are free w/ add or number limit per day.
reviews.replyText: Sorry for the inconvenienceüôá Mind telling me which function you were looking for so that I can guide you accordingly? As for having the way of earning more free credits, i will share it with the relevant team for further consideration and see what we can do! For more support, please Send Feedback to us by the home ‰∏â menu.üõ†Ô∏è

reviews.text: Update March 2024. Most of the app seems to function well still but you have new features like the AI voice changer and it works great except when you export it, then it just changes your voice back to the way it was. You should be able to keep the voice change when you produce the film! Why l make a feature you can't use? I mean it works, I'm glad I get to hear it but I want others too as well. Scoured the internet and can't find a solution! üò°
reviews.replyText: Thanks for reaching out, and sorry for the trouble. Would you mind sharing the project pack by uploading it to Google Drive (https://www.cyberlink.com/support/faq-content.do?id=25985) and sharing the link to the folder with us via "Send Feedback" in the settingsüõ†Ô∏è? It would help us have a better view of the issue! Thanks for your cooperation.üôÇ

reviews.text: Once again ruining the app when there was nothing wrong with it. I can't edit anything dealing with text now since you decided it would be a good idea to move the edit portion to the side of the screen instead of it coming up from the bottom. Go back that version instead. This one is just stupid. Are you trying to lose customers?
reviews.replyText: Thanks for telling us you dislike the current text editing UI, please accept our sincere apology. I'll make sure the feedback will be shared with the product design team for further consideration. Ultimately, if you need additional help, please let us know by Send Feedback in the settingsüõ†Ô∏è We'll help you as soon as possible.

app.AIReview:
PowerDirector - Video Editor Review

Overview

PowerDirector ‚Äì Video Editor is a mobile video editing application aiming to empower users of all skill levels to create professional-looking videos. With over 134 million installs and a robust 4.2988515 star rating from 1,728,424 users, the app has clearly established itself as a popular choice within the video editing landscape. The core proposition centers around leveraging AI to simplify the often-complex process of video creation, promising to transform everyday clips into engaging social media content or even viral TikTok videos. The app is offered entirely free with no in-app purchases for basic functionality ‚Äì a significant draw for many users.

Key Features

PowerDirector boasts a wide array of features designed to cater to diverse editing needs. Let‚Äôs break down the most prominent elements:

  • AI Auto Edit: This is arguably the app's headline feature and a core component of its marketing. The AI intelligently analyzes uploaded video clips, automatically identifying the best moments based on factors like movement, sound, and visual appeal. It then utilizes pre-designed templates to craft polished videos, saving users considerable time and effort. The app claims to be able to transform even raw footage into professional-looking results in seconds.
  • AI Image-to-Video: Expanding beyond simple clips, PowerDirector incorporates AI capabilities that convert still images into dynamic video sequences. Users can select a series of images and the AI will automatically add transitions and music to create a basic video. While this is useful for creating slideshows or quick social media content, the results can sometimes feel somewhat robotic without further manual adjustments.
  • Extensive Template Library: The app provides access to hundreds of professionally designed templates categorized by genre (e.g., travel, family, sports). These templates are a fantastic starting point for users who lack advanced editing skills or specific creative vision. Users can easily customize the templates with their own footage and music.
  • Rich Editing Tools: Beyond AI features, PowerDirector offers traditional video editing tools, including:
    • Multi-track Timeline: Allows layering of multiple video clips, audio tracks, and graphics for complex edits.
    • Color Grading & Correction: Provides a range of filters and adjustments to enhance the visual quality of videos.
    • Transitions: A wide selection of transitions (fade, zoom, wipe, etc.) to seamlessly connect different scenes.
    • Text & Title Tools: Enables adding text overlays with customizable fonts, sizes, and animations.
    • Music Library: Access to a royalty-free music library for background soundtracks.
    • Green Screen Effects (Chroma Key): Allows users to remove backgrounds from video footage.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use (AI Focus): The AI Auto Edit feature is genuinely impressive in its simplicity and effectiveness. It dramatically lowers the barrier to entry for novice video editors, allowing them to produce decent results without needing deep technical knowledge.
  • Large Template Library: The sheer volume of templates available provides a significant advantage, offering inspiration and accelerating the creation process. Templates are regularly updated, keeping the app‚Äôs content fresh.
  • Free Access to Core Features: The completely free version offers substantial functionality, making it accessible to anyone who wants to experiment with video editing without financial commitment.
  • Performance: Generally, PowerDirector runs smoothly on a variety of devices, even mid-range smartphones and tablets.

Areas for Improvement

  • AI Limitations: While the AI Auto Edit is convenient, it‚Äôs not always perfect. It can sometimes misinterpret scenes or produce results that require significant manual tweaking to refine. The quality of the output heavily relies on the initial footage ‚Äì highly chaotic or poorly lit clips may yield less desirable outcomes.
  • Template Over-Reliance: Users might become overly reliant on templates, limiting their creative control and potentially hindering their learning process.
  • Audio Editing Capabilities: While a music library is present, advanced audio editing features (e.g., noise reduction, EQ) are notably lacking in the free version.
  • Export Options: Export options could be more flexible, offering greater control over resolution, frame rate, and codec settings. The current options are somewhat limited.

User Experience

The user interface of PowerDirector is generally well-designed and intuitive, particularly for navigating the template library and using the AI Auto Edit feature. The timeline editor is logically laid out, making it relatively easy to arrange clips, add transitions, and adjust parameters. However, the abundance of features can occasionally feel overwhelming, especially for new users. The app does a decent job with tutorials but could benefit from more in-depth guidance on advanced editing techniques. The drag-and-drop functionality works reliably, contributing to an efficient workflow.

Value for Money

PowerDirector‚Äôs value proposition is strong due to its free availability. The core features are robust enough for creating high-quality videos for social media and personal use. While a premium subscription (which unlocks advanced features like 4K export and more sophisticated AI tools) exists, the majority of users will likely find the free version sufficient. The lack of aggressive monetization tactics ‚Äì no intrusive ads or limited feature restrictions in the free version ‚Äì further enhances its value.

Conclusion

PowerDirector - Video Editor is a powerful and accessible video editing app that deserves consideration for anyone looking to create engaging videos on their mobile device, particularly those new to video editing. Its AI-powered Auto Edit feature is genuinely innovative and simplifies the process significantly. While some limitations exist (primarily within the AI‚Äôs judgment), the abundance of templates, robust editing tools, and free access make it a compelling option for both beginners and more experienced users seeking a convenient and effective mobile video editor. The app's continued popularity reflects its value proposition ‚Äì delivering professional-looking results with minimal effort.
